TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HtmlTableCellCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public NotInheritable Class HtmlTableCellCollection Implements ICollection
public ref class HtmlTableCellCollection sealed : System::Collections::ICollection
type HtmlTableCellCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 对象的集合，这些对象表示 控件的一个行中的单元格。

span.span: A collection of objects that represent the cells in a single row of an control.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类以编程方式管理一系列对象表示的单个行中单元格控件。Use the class to programmatically manage a collection of objects that represent the cells of a single row in an control. 此类通常用于添加、 删除或修改的行中单元格的内容控件。This class is commonly used to add, remove, or modify the contents of a cell in a row of an control. > [!NOTE] > 控件包含属性，其中包含一系列对象。An control contains a property that contains a collection of objects. 每个对象都表示表中的单个行。Each object represents an individual row in the table. 对象包含表示的集合的属性对象。An object contains a property that represents a collection of objects. 这些对象，反过来，表示行的各个单元格。These objects, in turn, represent the individual cells of a row. 若要检索的单个单元格，请先获取对象，表示包含表中的单元格的行 (从的集合控件)。To retrieve an individual cell, first get the object that represents the row containing the cell in the table (from the collection of the control). 然后就可以获取表示的单元格的行中的对象 (从的集合对象)。You can then get the object that represents the cell in the row (from the collection of the object). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何动态生成的内容控件添加到单元格集合。The following code example demonstrates how to dynamically generate the contents of an control by adding cells to an collection. 请注意，属性所表示的行对象，则集合。Notice that the property of a row, represented by an object, is the collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableCellCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCellCollection/CS/htmltablecellcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableCellCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCellCollection/VB/htmltablecellcollectionvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 将指定的 对象追加到 集合的结尾。

span.span: Appends the specified object to the end of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法将添加指定到末尾的对象集合。Use this method to add the specified object to the end of an collection. 如果你想要插入对象中收集、 使用中的指定位置方法。If you want to insert an object in a specified location in the collection, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法要追加的表，由表示的单元格对象，到末尾集合。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to append a cell of a table, represented by an object, to the end of an collection. 请注意，属性所表示的行对象是集合。Notice that the property of a row represented by an object is the collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableCellCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCellCollection/CS/htmltablecellcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableCellCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCellCollection/VB/htmltablecellcollectionvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 从 集合中移除所有 对象。

span.span: Removes all objects from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于删除所有中的对象集合和重置属性设置为`0`。Use this method to remove all objects from the collection and reset the property to `0`. > [!NOTE] > 此方法删除单元格的行，但不会从表删除行。This method removes the cells from a row, but it does not remove the row from the table. 若要从表中删除行，请确保也会删除对象，表示从行的集合控件。To remove a row from the table, be sure to also remove the object that represents the row from the collection of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法中的所有项中都删除集合。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to remove all items from the collection. 然后，新条目将添加到集合并显示在控件。New entries are then added to the collection and displayed in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableCellCollectioncClear#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCellCollectioncClear/CS/htmltablecellcollectionclearcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableCellCollectioncClear#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCellCollectioncClear/VB/htmltablecellcollectionclearvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法将复制的内容到指定集合、 该数组的指定索引处开始。Use this method to copy the contents of the collection into the specified , starting at the specified index of the array. > [!NOTE] > `array`参数必须是一个从零开始。The `array` parameter must be a zero-based . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来创建一个数组，包含其内容与相同集合。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to create an array that contains the same contents as the collection. 然后循环访问数组以显示的内容集合。The array is then iterated through to display the contents of the collection. span.span: Gets the number of objects in the collection.
The number of objects in the .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定中包含的单元格的数目集合。Use the property to determine the number of cells contained in the collection. 循环访问集合以确定上限绑定时，通常使用属性。The property is commonly used when iterating through the collection to determine the upper bound. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定某行中单元格的数目控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the number of cells in a row of the control. 此值然后作为上限的一个循环用于循环访问表中的行的单元格。This value is then used as the upper bound of a loop to iterate through the cells of a row in the table. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableCellCollectionCount#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCellCollectionCount/CS/htmltablecellcollectioncountcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableCellCollectionCount#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCellCollectionCount/VB/htmltablecellcollectioncountvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: A -implemented object that contains all objects in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法创建-实现的对象可以循环访问以检索中的每项内容集合。Use this method to create a -implemented object that can be iterated through to retrieve the contents of each item in the collection. 使用指向当前获取项的属性的集合中。Use the property to get the item currently pointed to in the collection. 使用方法移动到集合中的下一项。Use the method to move to the next item in the collection. 使用方法将枚举数移到初始位置。Use the method to move the enumerator to the initial position. > [!NOTE] > 必须在创建后调用方法的实现的对象，或使用后方法将枚举数移到集合中的第一项。The method must be called after creating the -implemented object, or after using the method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection. 否则，该项表示未定义属性。Otherwise, the item represented by the property is undefined. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来创建-实现的对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to create a -implemented object. 然后循环访问该对象以显示的内容集合。The object is then iterated through to display the contents of the collection. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此索引器获取对象从集合。Use this indexer to get an object from the collection. 您可以访问中通过使用简单数组表示法指定索引处的对象。You can access an object at a specified index by using simple array notation. > [!NOTE] > 集合是从零开始;因此，集合中的第一个元素包含的索引值为`0`。The collection is zero-based; therefore, the first element in the collection contains an index value of `0`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用索引器检索所表示的表的单元格对象，从集合。The following code example demonstrates how to use the indexer to retrieve a cell of a table, represented by an object, from the collection. 然后使用新内容更新单元。The cell is then updated with new content. 请注意，属性所表示的行对象是集合。Notice that the property of a row represented by an object is the collection. span.span: Removes the object at the specified index from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法删除从指定索引处的对象集合。Use this method to remove the object at the specified index from an collection. 索引号是从零开始;因此，集合中的第一项具有的索引值为`0`。The index number is zero-based; therefore, the first item in the collection has an index value of `0`. > [!NOTE] > 如果指定的索引值的范围之外的索引，将引发异常。If you specify an index that is outside the range of index values, an exception is raised. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法中的指定索引处的项中删除集合。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to remove the item at the specified index from the collection. 此示例删除中的第一列的单元格控件。This example removes the cells from the first column of the control.
